name: Array Search
tagline: searching an element in an array
body:
# **INTRODUCTION**
_The program searches and reports if a given element is present in the array or not_

## **WORKING**
* _The number of elements are entered._
* _The elements are given as input in random order._ 
* _The elements are then sorted in ascending order._
* _The search element is given as input._
* _The element is searched in an array using binary search._
* _Results are displayed._

### **AUTHOR:**
* _S. Harshitha [harshitha-s](https://github.com/harshitha-s)_
* _Manasa Sreekesh [Manasa-Sreekesh](https://github.com/Manasa-Sreekesh)_
